#Coursera Getting and Cleaning Data Course Project

###Project background
This Github repo contains the required elements for the Course Project. The project requires candidates to tidy and summarise data collected from subjects performing different activities whilst wearing smartphones.

###Github repo requirements
- **run_analysis.R:** a file that can be run as long as the Samsung data is in the working directory. The output of which is the tidy data set submitted for part 1
- **README.md:** a document describing how the script works
- **CodeBook.md:** the code book describing the data, variables and transformations applied to get to the tidy data set

For information on the data sets used in this project visit: http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/Human+Activity+Recognition+Using+Smartphones
